channel.title: Sports
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from Sports, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: 4 Takeaways From Indiana's CFP National Championship Game Win Over Miami
item.description: Fernando Mendoza led the Hoosiers to a win over Miami that closed out an undefeated season and brought an improbable national championship to Indiana.

item.title: 2026 College Football Rankings: Indiana, Ohio State Highlight Way-Too-Early Top 25
item.description: FOX Sports' RJ Young reveals his way-too-early top 25 rankings going into the 2026 college football offseason.

item.title: 2026 CFP Title Odds: Indiana, Ohio State Open as Favorites
item.description: See next season's CFP title odds, now that the 2025 season has come to a close.

item.title: Titans Reportedly Set To Hire 49ers DC Robert Saleh As New Head Coach
item.description: The Tennessee Titans are finalizing a deal to hire San Francisco 49ers defensive coordinator Robert Saleh as their head coach, according to multiple r...

item.title: Women's College Basketball 2025-2026 Undefeated Teams Tracker: Vandy, UConn Stay Perfect
item.description: Here are the women's college basketball teams that are still undefeated in the 2025-2026 season.

item.title: Way-Too-Early Top 25: Sizing up the top contenders for next season
item.description: Who will raise the national championship trophy this time next year? We break down the teams to watch.

item.title: Transfer rumors, news: Liverpool eye Tottenham's Van de Ven
item.description: Liverpool and Real Madrid are keeping tabs on Tottenham's Micky van de Ven. Transfer Talk has the latest.

item.title: Which injuries will have the biggest impact on the Olympic hockey tournament?
item.description: Leo Carlsson, Brayden Point and Seth Jones are among those ailing ahead of Milan Cortina.

item.title: Does bringing in a 'caretaker manager' work? Will Man United and Real Madrid improve?
item.description: Both Man United and Real Madrid abruptly fired their coaches without permanent replacements lined up, so "caretaker managers" will see out the season.

item.title: 'Obviously, we would have a great team': What Russian NHLers are saying about missing the Olympics
item.description: Russia is suspended from international competition due to the war in Ukraine, sidelining many who'd otherwise be playing.
